about_the_game:
Save the Trees!

Waves of lumberjacks are coming to destroy the environment on your peaceful remote island.

Can you stop them?

Grow your Shrooms in tactical positions and skilfully deploy their abilities to take down waves of increasingly challenging enemies.

Never play the same game twice!

Bored of playing tower defence games with tiresome, rigid maps and paths? Choose from an unlimited number of maps with procedurally generated islands in Shrooms! The enemy lumberjacks will travel to all corners of the island to harvest your forest. They don't follow any set path but will lay down roads and bridges as they explore. Be ready to defend your land from all angles.

Pick between ten unique Shrooms to defend your island!

Use each Shroom's distinctive attack styles, effects, and abilities to repel the lumberjacks. Each Shroom has their strengths and their weaknesses against different classes of enemies so use them wisely. Will you prefer to stop them with poison or fire, explosions or natural disasters?

Harness the full power of your Shrooms!

Pick between six upgrades across three levels for your Shrooms. Each Shroom has unique upgrades, unlocking their full potential to protect their island home. Strengthen their base attacks or add new effects and abilities. Will you choose to spread many Shrooms across your island or fully upgrade a few powerhouses?

Exploit enemy weaknesses!

Lumberjacks come in many shapes and sizes - some are speedy and agile, while others are slow and bulky. Bust enemy shields, work around their immunities, and stop them in their tracks. Beware of powerful bosses. Can you prevent the destruction?

You won't be able to save the whole forest, but can you stem the flow of enemies and stop them taking over the whole island?

Only the best strategy will reward you with victory!

  • OS: macOS Ventura or later
  • Processor: Silicon or Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Mac compatible

short_description: Protect your island from the evil lumberjacks! Shrooms is a 3D tower defence game where you harness the power of mycelium to defend your unique forested island.
